title: The Six Immortals - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mystery   Xuanhuan
tags: Accelerated Growth   Age Progression   Ancient China   Arrogant Characters   Artifacts   Average-looking Protagonist   Beast Companions   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Determined Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Mysterious Past   Orphans   Pill Concocting   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sudden Strength Gain   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Ting Fei Yun   云霆飞
description: Six circles exist between the heaven and earth. Bi Fan, weak and lonely, grows little by little and takes the world by surprise. As the wars for power, glory, fame and money rage on, ‘The Six Immortals’, a tale of Love, Hatred, Regret, Passion, Rivalry and Self-Sacrifice unfolds.>
